fields.title: Barbie as Rapunzel
fields.review: Good movie This is a good barbie movie.

fields.title: Barbie and the Magic of Pegasus
fields.review: One of the best barbie movie of all time, great visualization, story, and music.

fields.title: Barbie: A Perfect Christmas
fields.review: It's a harmless fun little holiday movie in this franchise.

fields.title: Barbie: A Fashion Fairytale
fields.review: Focused heavy on fashion. Shallow movie. This is when mattel's direction changed. Fairies feature in this as well as magic yet again especially at the end. Don't recommend.

fields.title: Barbie: Princess Charm School
fields.review: Great plot, costume, visualization, but lack of music.

fields.title: Barbie in A Mermaid Tail
fields.review: Love it. It is so good and the best movie I have ever seen. My favorite character is the seal, its so cute and funny!

fields.title: Barbie as the Island Princess
fields.review: One of the best barbie musical movies of all time. Great family movie.

fields.title: Barbie and the Three Musketeers
fields.review: Overall watching this movie again was enjoyable,had a good message but so many things did not add up.

fields.title: Barbie: A Fairy Secret
fields.review: Weird messages about money & shipping, set the feminist movement back 100 years.

fields.title: Barbie: Spy Squad
fields.review: Compared to other Barbie movies this one didn't exceed my expectations.

fields.title: Barbie & the Diamond Castle
fields.review: Pure magic and imagination at its finest.
